alert.note: Alert for Gila; Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 5:58PM MST until September 12 at 6:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 645 PM MST. * At 558 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sunflower, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Round Valley, Ballantine Trailhead, Sycamore Creek, Sunflower, Roosevelt, Punkin Center, Tonto Basin, Tonto National Monument, Roosevelt Dam, and Four Peaks. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 207 and 229. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 239 and 267. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
